ddf.catalog.validation.impl

Class ReportingMetacardValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.validation.impl.ReportingMetacardValidatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetacardValidator, ReportingMetacardValidator

    public class ReportingMetacardValidatorImpl
extends Object
implements MetacardValidator, ReportingMetacardValidator
    Default Metacard validator that validates all of a Metacard's attributes using the AttributeValidators registered in the attribute validator registry.

        public Optional<MetacardValidationReport> validateMetacard(Metacard metacard)
        Description copied from interface: ReportingMetacardValidator
        Validates a Metacard.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
